subtitle: Rich and sinful luxury chocolate recipe that blends well with fresh raspberries. This recipe does not contain flour in the roulade.

method.text: Line a 33 x 23 cm / 13 x 9in Swiss roll tin with baking parchment paper. In a bowl, whisk the egg yolks and sugar together until very thick and pale in colour. Stir in the hot coffee.

Whisk egg whites until stiff. Fold into the egg mixture then fold in the melted chocolate carefully. Pour into the prepared tin and smooth over the surface. Bake for 15-20 min or until crusty and puffy.
When cooked, remove from the oven and place on a piece of baking parchment. Place a damp tea towel over the top. Leave overnight.
Turn out onto a piece of paper dusted with the icing sugar and trim the four sides.
For the filling: fold the Kirsch into the cream and spread onto the roll. Carefully roll like a Swiss roll. Chill well and serve in slices. Decorate with raspberries and mint.

title: Luxury chocolate roulade
